name: Jordan 1 Retro Low OG Mystic Navy
description: The Air Jordan 1 Retro Low OG 'Mystic Navy' gets a colorway resembling another original from 1985. An all-leather upper features a black base with hits of contrasting dark navy on the toe box, heel counter and Swoosh. Mystic Blue can be found on the tongue tag on the NIKE AIR, while a black Wings logo is emblazoned on both heels of the shoe. A contrasting white midsole adds a hit of color, embedded with encapsulated Nike Air units for cushioning.
